entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
